```{r}
Selected.Data <- read.csv(file="C:/Users/BCamp/Desktop/Capstone Project/Data_SelectedVariables.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")

#Normalize the data, and run correlation for all variables vs. Bankruptcy Outcome
normalize <- function(x) {
               return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) }
Data.Norm <- prc_n <- as.data.frame(lapply(Selected.Data[1:12], normalize))

summary(Data.Norm)
```

```{r}
sapply(Data.Norm, sd, na.rm=TRUE)
```
